english.segment1: Well, look at yourself now. Swinging that sword around. You think there's something there. But you're just fighting air. You can't do this alone
english.segment2: Hush, little boy, don't say a word. Don't you know Daddy's got this one?. Hey, little boy, bury your sword. Jesus already won this war
english.segment3: Heroes will be heroes. The first to volunteer. But no one here is asking. And all the lines are clear. All who are weak, at ease
english.segment4: You push yourself too hard. And your feet get so tired. Can't look back just yet. Or you might lose this fight. This is not your fight
english.segment5: Hush, little boy, don't say a word. Don't you know Daddy's got this one?. Hey, little boy, bury your sword. Jesus already won this war
